default.name: Default
default.description: The default for this option is `{{default}}`.

override.name: Overridden
override.description: This is overridden by server admins.

locale.name: Language
locale.description: The language the bot will use. Server admins can override this per-server.

preferEphemeral.name: Prefer Ephemeral
preferEphemeral.description: Whether the bot should prefer ephemeral (hidden) messages over regular messages. Server admins can override this per-server.

locale.name: Language
locale.description: The language the bot will use in this server. The user's language is used by default if this isn't forced using 'Force Language'.

forceLocale.name: Force Language
forceLocale.description: Force the bot to use the language set in this server instead of the user's language.

prefix.name: Prefix
prefix.description: The prefix the bot will use for commands.

features.name: Features
features.description: The features enabled/disabled in this server.

logChannel.name: Log Channel
logChannel.description: The channel the bot will log moderation actions to.

forceEphemeral.name: Force Ephemeral
forceEphemeral.description: Whether the bot should force ephemeral (hidden) messages.

ephemeralDeletionTimeout.name: Ephemeral Deletion Time
ephemeralDeletionTimeout.description: The time in seconds before the bot deletes ephemeral messages. This includes messages like AFK notices. *Not to be confused with ephemeral interactions.*
